title: Using GPU Operator
shortDescription: How to create a cluster with a GPU and split the GPU into several pods using MPS and MIG technologies
metaDescription: Learn how to deploy a GPU-enabled cluster on the VK Cloud platform using GPU Operator: create a cluster with a GPU node, set up and test GPU functionality, allocate GPU resources between pods using MPS or MIG technologies, and switch between these GPU sharing modes. A comprehensive step-by-step guide for VK Cloud users.
